line_1: Nor do I use one grain of powder,
line_2: Either the violet or the other;

line_1: She reduc'd him to dust, and she drank up the Powder.
line_2: In respect for the love and affection he'd show'd her,

line_1: Then skulks off in a shower of powder.
line_2: And shake his well-fill'd wig about her;
